channel.title: [508]How to add vesta spear, stat hammer, and v long attack right with spec?[508]
channel.description: [size=15pt]Hey, Title says pretty much all, but i have the models in the client, they all can be weilded, and have bonuses and can attack, so my next question is, how do i make a special for them/ attack the right way? for example, vesta spear hits like... weird... not like a spear, also how can i make the vesta spear 2 handed? i cant seem to find the answers to these questions, so can some one please help me? and if i need new models like a special anim or something can some one tell me where to find them/name/ a link :D that would be VERY helpful.[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 03:30:00 pm[/size][hr][size=10pt]Can some one please help me??? if you cant then just leave a comment saying you cant, or tell me a person who would know... :mad:[/size]

item.title: [508]How to add vesta spear, stat hammer, and v long attack right with spec?[508]
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

ty, 2h stuff is done :D, now to do the specials… i been asking people on dif websites for 5 days rofl no one answers :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2009, 07:21:00 pm[/size][hr]btw that isnt the way i fixed it, im using a 508 dif then that

Read full topic

item.title: [508]How to add vesta spear, stat hammer, and v long attack right with spec?[508]
item.dc:creator: @conja conja
item.description:
@conja wrote:

To fix to 2handed problem, go to the source files, then look for Item.java and Item4.java. you might only have one, it dosnt matter. then somewhere it should have a list of 2handed wepons, just add the ID in there

For your specs, i dont have a clue lol. sorry

Read full topic
